text: Caribachlamys ornata , the ornate scallop, is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Pectinidae. It can be found in Caribbean waters, ranging from southern Florida to the West Indies and Brazil.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 28. ==References== Category:Pectinidae Category:Bivalves described in 1819 Category:Fauna of the Caribbean Category:Fauna of the Dominican Republic Category:Taxa named by Jean-Baptiste Lamarck
title: Caribachlamys ornata
